name: liztochekvsc
description: Customizable Discord Rich Presence extension for Visual Studio Code

commands.title: Enable Discord Presence in the current workspace
Disable Discord Presence in the current workspace

liztochekvsc.app.name.description:
Choose the name you want the application to use.
Choosing "Custom" will make it so it use the "rpc.id" as application id

liztochekvsc.app.id.description: Application id that will be used when `appName` is "Custom" or when `appName` is invalid

liztochekvsc.app.whitelistIsBlacklist.description: Switches the whitelist to a blacklist.

liztochekvsc.app.whitelist.description: List of discord user ids that will be able to use the extension.

liztochekvsc.status.resetElapsedTimePerF.description: Should we reset the elapsed time after switching file?

liztochekvsc.status.problems.text.description: This text will be shown when there is a problem.

liztochekvsc.status.problems.countedSeve.description: List of problem level to count for `problems_count`.

liztochekvsc.status.idle.enabled.description: Should we enable the idle status?

liztochekvsc.status.idle.check.description: Should we check when you are idling?

liztochekvsc.status.idle.disconnectOnIdl.description: Should going idle disconnect you from discord gateway?.

liztochekvsc.status.idle.resetElapsedTim.description: Should going idle reset the elapsed time?.

liztochekvsc.status.idle.timeout.description: Time in seconds before the user is considered idle.

liztochekvsc.ignore.workspaces.description: A list of workspace (name / path) to ignore.

liztochekvsc.ignore.workspacesText.description: The text / object to show in the status when current workspace is ignored, when using the object, key is workspace name and value is the text.

liztochekvsc.ignore.repositories.description: A list of repository name to ignore.

liztochekvsc.ignore.organizations.description: A list of git organizations to ignore.

liztochekvsc.ignore.gitHosts.description: A list of git host to ignore.

liztochekvsc.status.details.idle.enabled.description: Should details be shown when idling?

liztochekvsc.status.details.text.idle.description: The text to show when idling.

liztochekvsc.status.details.text.editing.description: The text to show when editing a file.

liztochekvsc.status.details.text.debuggi.description: The text to show when debugging.

liztochekvsc.status.details.text.viewing.description: The text to show when viewing a file.

liztochekvsc.status.details.text.notInFi.description: The text to show when you are not in a file.

liztochekvsc.status.details.text.noWorkS.description: The text to show when you are not in a workspace and there is no workspace text.

liztochekvsc.status.state.idle.enabled.description: Should state be shown when idling?

liztochekvsc.status.state.text.idle.description: The text to show when idling.

liztochekvsc.status.state.text.editing.description: The text to show when editting a file.

liztochekvsc.status.state.text.debugging.description: The text to show when debugging.

liztochekvsc.status.state.text.viewing.description: The text to show when viewing a file.

liztochekvsc.status.state.text.notInFile.description: The text to show when you are not in a file.

liztochekvsc.status.state.text.noWorkspa.description: The text to show when no workspace is found.

liztochekvsc.status.image.large.idle.key.description: The image url to use when idling

liztochekvsc.status.image.large.idle.tex.description: The large text to show when idling.

liztochekvsc.file.size.round.description: The number of decimal places to round the file size to.

liztochekvsc.file.size.spacer.description: Spacer between the number and the unit.

liztochekvsc.behaviour.additionalFileMap.description: Additional regex to check for language, key is regex and value is the language.

liztochekvsc.behaviour.suppressNotificat.description: Suppresses all notifications from the extension.

liztochekvsc.behavoiur.prioritizeLanguag.description: Prioritize language defined by editor over file extension when determining the language for the file.

liztochekvsc.file.size.humanReadable.description: If true, the file size will be displayed in a human readable format (e.g. 1.2 MB). If false, the file size will be displayed in bytes.

liztochekvsc.file.size.standard.description: The unit standard to use when displaying the file size.
